# ERRORS, WARNING, MISSING-DATA
from cerebralcortex.core.log_manager.log_handler import LogHandler



[docs]class CCLogging(LogHandler):
    def __init__(self, CC):
        """
        Helper class to log all the errors and warnings
        Args:
            CC (CerebralCortex): cerebralcortex class object
        """
        self.debug = CC.debug
        self.throw_exception = CC.config["cc"]["throw_exception"]
